sourcesContent:
const Status = ({bmi,fat,calorie,plan,week,level}) => { const getStatus = async () => { const res = await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/Plan/1') const data = await res.json() return data } var da = getStatus() var color = " " var cat = " " bmi=da.bmi if(bmi <= 18.5 ){ color = "rgb(134 177 217)" cat = "under weigth" } else if(bmi <= 24.9){ color = "rgb(61 211 101)" cat = "Normal" } else if(bmi <= 29.9){ color = "rgb(238 225 51)" cat = "Over weigth" } else if(bmi <= 34.9){ color = "rgb(253 128 46)" cat = "Obese" } else{ color = "rgb(249 83 83)" cat = "Extermely obese" } return (

Body mass index


{bmi}

-{cat}

Body fat percentage %


{fat}%

Average calorie intake(needed)


{calorie}kc

Exercise plan


{plan}

Week


{week}

Diffculty


{level}

) } export default Status
